24b3(rgyud 'grel): ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM zla ba'i gzi ltar dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer dkar po spros pas lus bkang ste/ sdig pa dag 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la/ de las stong pa nyid bsgoms la hUM zhes brjod pas bdag nyid las kyi he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis par bsgom ste/ de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM dkar po bsams te/ 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): lkog mar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du A dmar po bsapa snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams la/ oM AHhUM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas gsungs te/ bdud rtsi'am/ 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pa la oM AHhUM bzlas la/ oM badz+ra ra khe hUM/ zhes zlos shing / maN+Dal byug par bya'o// de nas lag pa bshal te thal mo sbyar te phan yin brjod par bya'o// chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa yin/ 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyangar nul byas pa tshul khrims yini// grogs mo sogs bsal bzod pa yin// bya ba brtsams pa brtson 'grus yin// skad cig rtso gcig bsam gtan yin// ri mo snyoms pa shes rab yin/ 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): thub pa'i maN+Dal byas pas pha rol phyin drug de dag rnyed par 'gyur// lha ri khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing // nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal rigs 'bru dang 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): gser sogs 'byor pa ldan par skye// de nas bde gshegs mchog gi khyim du lus las bya zhes brjod do// de nas lag pa g.yon pas sa la reg par byas la/ oM badz+ra me dI ni badz+ri b+ha 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis sa gzhi de sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur par bsam mo// de nas me tog gi tshom bu dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya ste/ dbus su oM AHhUM na maHzhes brjod de me tog dor ro// 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): shar du ga gau rI na maHzhes bya bas me tog dor ro// lhor tsu tsau rI na maHzhes bya bas me tog dor ro// nub tu be bet+tA lIn maHzhes bya bas dor ro// byang du g+haM g+has+sa rI na maHzhes bya bas dor ro// dbang 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan du paM puka sI na maHzhes bya bas dor ro// me'i mtshams su saM sa la rI na maHzhes bya bas dor ro// bden bral du laM tsaN+Da lI na maHzhes bya bas so// rlung mtshams su ni Te Dom+b+hi ni na maHzhes pas so// 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i hUM las 'od bar 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs brag g.yon pa nas zhugs te/ thugs ka'i 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la bsnun pa tsam gyis/ thugs bskul nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes pa rdo rje'i lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du sprul te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer gyi 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): sAl 'jus te 'ongs pa'i bgegs thams cad tshar bcad pa'i bsam pas hUM bzhis bgegs bskrad par bya'o// de nas oM badz+re gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dza/ oM badz+ra tsau rI pra be sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra bit+tA lI ban+d+ha 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): ya baM/ oM badz+ra g+hasma rI ba shi ku ru ho// zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi lha dgu me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor la dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ste/ yi ge brgya pas kyang brtan 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha/ A rmAHsmra drunan zlu k+ku r+m+ma k+Sha ts+tsha b+h+ya gyu // na m+b+ha 2// gas 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): sanas// 26 gyu byu/ / da // la sa pa grugags nas// 'a lan tha gyur// gcangs pa 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): gzusus pa dang // rabs pa/ bku / 'dang zhes kyiskyed 'grus 'basapa sa// 'gyub 'di dgasan byu byer/ pas sas gzugs ma dang / rlabs na 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): nga// bdug ya ra gas// b+ha 'a / k+sha / nga blugasupa da// rnanas 'a la zla / rnams 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): ba shAk+Sha d+hA thA swAH/ sa bcwam na 'ad / ma hU~M Sh+Ta sa ma las ste la ya/ nas b+ha bas ldan 'das pal da pa/ yang sna mthun nA 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): ma shi rkyen gnasang+yas ten d+hA lan shASh+TA baN+Di hrI la tha pa sa~M ka dz+wa la ma spyan t+tA rdzun pa oM pad+hA b+hA na/ mAn ma/ e marten du 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyan byas sa dang // de lta 'as nga dgag da / dupas sa ma Sh+Tanas bzlas 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): matog dang mchad rdzas thams cad la bstan pas/ byin gyis brlabs la/ a sarba pag tan dz+nyA phaT k+ShaN+Da zhes bya bas drim ba kyis bsangs te/ a badz+ran ra ti m+ba zhes bya bas zhabs bsil bral la/ 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): oM hri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA/ sarba pA paM ni saM sho d+hA ya/ sarba bi kalpA/ a pa na ya hUM zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ khaM ra zhes bya bas ar+g+ha phul la/ oM badz+ra d+hU be AHhUM/ oM badz+ra 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke AHhUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he A b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra ni bi t+ye AHhUM/ oM badz+ra shap+ta AHhUM/ phaT swA hA zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / lha bshes dang / sil sA na 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams la bdag dbul bar bgyis lags kyis thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol// de nas bstod pa 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu pas kyang bstod la/ de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ ji srid thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar phyin ci log gi rtog pas bsngags pa'i sdig pa'i las bdag gis bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): bde dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bshags shing phyis sdom par bgyid do// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid do// bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i khams gsum bde ba chen por rnam par ro gcig pa'i 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dgyes mdzad rdo rje dang / des gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang / 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'khor lo la 'khor bar gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la ban 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bde ba bsgrubs pa dang / 'di dag ji srid mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung // zhes sems bskyod la/ de nas 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la brten par bya'o// bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lus 'bul lags kyis/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol zhes lus 'bul te/ de nas smon lam gdab par bya ste/ rigs skyes rjes su ma nyams shing // dam chog can dgyes rdo rje 'chang // snying rjer ldan zhing bla mar gus// skye nang skye bar bdag 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang // btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can// skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig/ he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas// sems can kun gyi 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan yang byed// he ru ka'i go 'phang mchog thob nas// sems can ma lus 'di la 'god cing 'jog par shog/ de ltar bstod pa'i mchod sbyin las ni rdo rje rigs mchog tu ni bdag myur skye gyur cig/ 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can phan phyir yang dag thabs kyi yon tan dang ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhin bdag gyur cig/ rnal 'byor ma kun la ni dpe med pa de ste ro rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du bdag gyur cig/ phyag rgya drug
26b8(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag brgyan dur khrod gnas su tshangs par spyod dang ldan par bdag gyur cig/ de'i 'og tu yi ge brgya pas cho ga kha bskang zhing bshags pa bya ste/ oM badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ he ru ka ton pa 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rAk+to me b+ha ga/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+ham+me pra ya tsA/ sarba karmA su tsa me/ tsita te shre yaHku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wa na sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ma me 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): muny+tsa/ badz+rI b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHzhes pas bshags la/ ye shes lha oM AHhUM badz+ra muHzhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo// dam tshig lta bdag gis thugs kar bsdus la/ me tog gi tshem bu 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bsdus nas/ oM AHhUM bzlas la gzhog go/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga/ slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // thabs dang dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog/ gdod nas thams 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): cad de bzhin gnas// gnyis med don gyi bdag nyid can// kye rdo rje 'phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba// dmar po thugs rje rgyun mi 'chang // gyen rjes 'gro ba 'dren pa ste// he ru ka la 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan gsum rnam par thar pa gsam// dmar ba chos nyid chags pa'i don// hUM sgrogs skyob med pa ste// kun gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas na gdug 'joms rdo rje ste 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na bde skyong ka pA la// shes rab mtshon pa kha T+wAM ga/ longs spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa ye shes lnga yi dngos// phyag rgya lnga ni rigs lnga ste// do shal phreng ba 'du byed spangs// sprul 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): sku khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs mgos pad+ma'i gdan// rnam rtog mi mnga' tshangs pa'i ro// ma rig pasreg pa'i nyi ma ste// gos med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdzogs so// 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): skyon cigag cig padags/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ho ma~M bad+hi/ bod skad du// sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang // bdag med ma gus 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): g+ha b+h+yas ste// rdo rjesapa dpon paka' drin gyis// sbyin sreg chag bshad par bya// bdag gzhan dran par 'ad pa yis// na shig rnal sogs spangs te// chas b+hA 'brang ba 'azla yis ni/ 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg rim pa mnyan par gyes// bla med nang dang gyural te// sbyin sreg dbye ba rnam pa gsum// ye shes me lta phung po sogs// brad shing bsreg pa bla med yin// phyi rol sbyin sreg gis bskus te// 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): kha zas bza' sogs nang byir bshad// dkyil 'khor dang ni lha gnas dang // sgrub pa'i dus sa sbyin sreg bya// sbyin sdug las rnams zad pa las// dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// las rnam 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsgrub pa'i byung // mabyas pas sbyin mug las rnams parnamaswA// sngag pa 'jog bye paste/ babadan pas yong sa 'dzin rgyas pa yin// chags pa bsnam gyi dbang 'gyur / 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa zang pyi gi sod pa yin// nyon mongs sor bzhi byed dang // ting nge 'dzin na rgyas byed byer// rang ga yi sbyong bas bdag/ dzag par ni sems kyis byas// de nas yi ba shang bya ste// sa 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang // slob pa pa dang wA ga dang // sgrub pa'i thab dang rnam ldar 'gyur// de la thab zang ba shad pa ni// thams can dbyabs mtha' yas te// las kyi dbyebs pani 'gyur//

32b6(rgyud 'grel): du ston par byed par shog/ dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas// dpal ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsdus// ci bde bas ni gnas par bya// 'di ni bla ma'i rim thob pa'i// bdag nyid dran par bya ba'i phyir// cho ga cung zad 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa la// mkhas pa rnams ni bzod par mdzod// dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur yon tan sngon 'gro tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi// cho ga gsal por bris pa'i bsod nams bdag gis gang thob des// byur du dpal ldan 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang yul skal bzang la chags shing // srid pa las grol zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po thob par shog// dam tshig lnga pa zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// dpal rig pa'i gnas 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ri ka ma la shi la'i gtsug lag khang du// khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri d+harmA kI rtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // btsud dpal ca b+han dga'e bstang ba nas bya ba zhugs// @#// rgya gar skad du/ 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): shrI he badz+ra b+ha Da rA ga sti tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun dpal kye rdo rje'i b+ha Da rA ga'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog/ gdod nas thams cad bdag nyid gnas// 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// kyai rdo rje bdag phyag 'tshal// bdag med ma yi mgul nas 'khyud// dbus skra ser po gyen du 'bar// zhal brgyad po la spyan gsum pa// mgon po de la bdag phyag 'tshal// spyi ba 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): dang steng nag po mdzes// dkar dang dmar po g.yas dang g.yon// gang gi lhag ma'i zhal rnams ni// nag po de la bdag phyag 'tshal// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang seng ge de byi la// g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad la gnas 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// thod pa brgyad dang ldan pa po// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // zla nyi ga shin rje gsang ba pa// g.yon pa'i phyag brgyad la gnas pa'i// thod par 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// zhabs bzhi yis ni bdud bzhi po// mnyam
33a6(rgyud 'grel): par mnan cing gcer bu nyid// nyi mar zhabs g.yas brkyang dang sngo// gar mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid 'jigs// 'dzag pa'i mgo bos rnam par brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor mtshan// dpral bar rigs kyi bdag po nyid// dam pa'i dga' ba yang dag thob// bde chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// galas skyes pa'i gau rI shar// yan 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): lag gnag cing g.yon na nya// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// tshangs pa mnan la bdag phyag 'tshal// tsa las skyes pa'i chom rkun ma// bcod kyi mdog can lho phyogs su// phyag na phag dang cing te'u bsnams// dbang po 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): mnan la bdag phyag 'tshal// baM las skyes pa'i sor mo nub// ro langs ma ni nye dbang mnan// phyag g.yon lhung bzed g.yas pa yis// ru sbal bsnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// g+hasma rI ni byang gi sgor// ljang gu 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha las byung ba yi// phyag gnyis sbrul dang thod pas zol// drag po mnan la bdag phyag 'tshal// gshin rje mnan cing baM las byung // g.yon na dgra sta seng ge g.yas// dbang ldan du ni 'jigs gzugs me// 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal puk+ka sI sngo la'o// ri khrod ma dkar shaM las byung // me ru nor bdag steng na gnas// g.yon nagasil byed g.yas pa na// dge slong 'dzin la bdag phyag 'tshal// gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma// srin 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): po ra laM las byung ba yi// g.yon na thod pa 'khor lo g.yas// phyag 'tshal srin po nyid la'o// DaM las 'khrungs pa'i g.yung mo ni// rlung mtshams thags zangs ris steng gnas// phyag g.yon sdig mdzub rdo rje g.yas// 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mdog la bdag phyag 'tshal// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gcer bu spyan gsum thams cad la// bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// phung po khams ni 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pa// byang chub sems las byung ba yi// bder ba ster 'di thams cad la// dngos po kun gyis phyag 'tshal lo// nyid kyi g.yas pa'i phyag bzung ba'i// phyag mtshan sa bon las byung ba'i// bde chen 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa thams cad la// rtag tu yang dag phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig nyi zla kha sbyar gnas sa bon// gnyis las skyes pa'i gtso bo rig mar bcas// nyid kyis nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las ni// 'jig rten gsum
33b8(rgyud 'grel): bo sprul par mdzad dang ldan// nyid las 'di dag thams cad ma lus par/ zhi ba'i bde stsol rig ma dang bcas te// shes rab chags pa bdud rtsi'i ro nyid kyi// gnas su zhi ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gtse kye rdo rje// lha mo'i 'khor lo bcas bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa// des ni 'jig rten de mtshungs shog/ rje btsun dpal kye rdo rje'i b+ha Da rA ga'i bstod pa nyi shu pa zhes bya ba dngos grub 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // dpa' bgacin pa'i sgrub papas bcugs/ 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI la ka bI ra sA d+ha na na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// sring rje shes rab gnyis med bdag/ he ru ka dang bdag med dang // rdo rje 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon zhabs pad+ma// phyaga'i tshal dpa' bo gcig pa bri// bu mang rgan po blo dman pas// dngos grub thob phyir rab tu bsdus// dang po kho nar rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje slob dpon yang dag pal kye rdo rje las gsungs pa'i 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pas sems legs par sbyangs pas ji skad gsungs pa'i gsungs nyams dga' bar legs par sbyangs pa'i shes rab dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar gnas par bya'o// de nas phyi nang gi khrus dang mchod pa 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gtor ma tshogs pa dang / rong gi snying gar nyi ma la hUM dkar po 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi snang bas nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas yang dag por gsal ba la/ lha mo brgyad kyi phyag na bdud rtsi lnga dang / ro'i bcud dang / cang 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): te'u dang / 'khyud pas mchod pa dang / de'i mdun na sdig pa bshags pa dang / byed pa sdom pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsngo ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
34a8(rgyud 'grel): pa byug/ sa yang du pa da[] na gas par banas das ldan 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi la'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su d+hA yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur/ de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las rdo rje rab dang / gur dang / sa gzhi la sogs pargyas par bsgom/ de'i dbus su shes rab e'i dbyibs 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba bsgom mo// der ya/ ra/ ga la/ rnams las/ rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor zla kham dang / grugasupa dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi rnams dang / bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi rta bab/ 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ ka ba brgyad pa/ dra ba dra phyed dang / nyi zla dang sna tshogs pa'i dar dang / me tog la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas brgyan pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su bsgom mo// de'i dbus su pad+ma dmar po dang / nyi ma'i dbus su tshangs 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): padang dbang po khyab 'jug dang / drag pa'i snying gar dbyangs dang gsal byed gnyis yongs su gyur pa las/ tha ba dang nyi ma/ de'i dbus su a dang hUM las gri gug dang thod pa/ e hUM gis mtshan pa spro ba dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo// thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las/ bdag nyid dpal kye rdo rje bdag med ma dang bde ba sdom pa/ zhal brgyad pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhabs bzhi pa/ sku mdog zla ba dang shel lta bu dang / rtsa ba'i zhal sku lta bu/ g.yas 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon po/ g.yon dmar po gzha dpung po lta bu gtsigs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad na/ rim par glang pa dang / rta dang / bung bu dang / glang dang / rnga mo dang / mi dang / seng ge dang / byil bsnams pa/ de bzhin du g.yon 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad na/ sa dang / chu dang / rlung dang me dang / tha ba dang / nyi ma dang / gshin rje dang / gnod sbyin bsnams pa/ thod pa'i dbu rgyan dang / do shal dang / phyag rgya lnga dang / stag lpags kyi sham thabs dang / thal ba dang / tshangs skud 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba la/ sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug pa/ phyed krung bcas pas bdud kyi steng na rol pa/ bdag med ma nag mo zhal cig phyag gnyis ma/ skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ 'khor 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): lo dang / rna cha dang / mgul rgyan dang / lag gdub dang / ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ gri gug dang zad pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gis gtso bo'i mgul nas 'khyud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i/ 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag gis gnas par bya'o// de nas snying ga'i sa bon las/ 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas la/ gnyis su med par bstim par bya'o// 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM traM hre kha hUM/ mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa/ dkar po/ sngon po/ ser po/ dmar po/ ljang gu nag po dang / gri gug dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams par 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyi lugs kyus de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la mchod pa bya ste/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes gsol ba btab pas/ de dag he ru ka'i gzugs su gyur pas 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur bas/ rigs kyi bdag pos spyi bor mtshan par bsam mo// de nas gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms pas/ brtags pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas dngos grub 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): thob bo// bskyed pa'i rim la dga' ba yis// rtsa sogs gsang sngags btu bzlas nas// 'byung po che la gtor ma byin// dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams bya// ko la ri glu blang 'dod longs spyod// dka' thub mi
35a7(rgyud 'grel): spyad bde bas bsgrub// bdud rtsi lnga po rtag tu bza'// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// bcu drug phyag ni stong pa ste// zhabs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi// spyan gsum po ni sku gsum yin// snying rje spyan ni 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ste// yan lag nag po byams pa'i sems// gug khyed rnam dag sangs rgyas lnga// khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba po// phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na// rdo rje ma sogs lha mo lnga// khams bzhi dag pas lha mo bani// 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): mig sogs gti mug rdo rje sogs// yul sogs dag pa lha mo drug/ yang dag par ni rang bzhin med// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya// spyod lam dag ni ci spyad dang // rtag tu de 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dran byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// shes rab rgyud kyi snying po kye rdo rje rgya mtsho las// de nyid bsdus pa dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// gsal bar byas pa'i dge ba gang yin des// 'gro 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus dngos grub thob par shog/ dpal dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon rdo rje dril bus mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // dpal kyi rjezhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs bzhugs// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI he badz+ra nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal kye rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje la 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// e ba nyid bzhugs rje bo mgon po bzhi// dang po tha ma dbus las rnam par grol// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rgan pa rnams kyi rkang pa la 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): dad pa spyod pas phyag btsal nas bris/ dang por gnas bstan par bya ba ni/ shing gcig gam ni dur khrod du// de bzhin ma mo khyim bdag gam// yang na dben pa'am pas mtha' ru// der ni bsgom pa bzang bar 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// zhes 'byung bas na gnas der ram/ rang nyams dga' ba'i gnas su 'dug nas/ sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du byas nas/ nub mo rang gi snying gar 'dug nas/ raM las nyi 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du thabs dang shes rab can yi ge hUM/ nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong nas/ lha mo brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa spros nas mchod pa/ gau rI zla ba'i 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): / snod can/ tsi dI nyi ma'i snod car/ bet+tA lI dri chu'i snod can/ g+hasma rI sman gyi snod can/ bug sI rdo rje 'dzin pa/ sa ba rI bdud ci'i snod can/ tsaN+Da lI rnge'u chung 'dzin ma/ de rnams kyi mchod pa tsam+bin pa 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): byadabyer med pa'i chags pa chen po dang rjes su chags par byed/ de nas phyi'i mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / dkon mchog gsul la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o// de nas dang po byams pa dang / gnyis 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): pa snyid rje dang / gsum pa dga' ba dang / bzhi pa btang sems su bya'o// de nas sems stong pa nyid du byed pa/ 'khor ba bdag tu 'dzin pa med par bya/ oM shUn+ya tA dA ra badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+makoH/ de nas yi ger las sngon du 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ de'i lta ba la thA/ de las 'od zer 'phros pos zla dang / sa ga ni dang rtsig par gyur/ de'i dbus su nam mkha'i dbyings kyi 'byung gnas su bskol pa ni rlung gi dkyis 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma'i dkyil 'khor/ chu'i dkyil 'khor / si'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i skang dusbrulas 'khar lo lta ba la thu byung nga 'khor ma gnyis dbyer med pa las rnam par snang mdad de dang 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dres nas/ chos 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su gzham yas kyang du gyur/ gzhal yas khang thog gcig pa/ sgra bzhi pa/ tA rin bzhis mdzes pa/ me tog sa tshogs pa'i gzugs can/ de'i dbus su A li la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ kA ma las ti 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): ma 'amar dang / zla ba lang / b+ha'i la shis nye ma mnyam pa nyid kyis ma shas dbus su thams na rjem sar rtag pa'i la shes/ gcig tu 'dras pa'i ba bya bgrub pa'i ye shes/ darjes mas dpa'i gzugs su / 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): bcas kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i lags te/ 'dras pa la gtusas na rnamams dpa' de me na par byang chub pa rdzas srubaskyed pa'o// zhas dang phyags can la pa dang sas su mthun pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' di 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs can/ phrag ban drug nas brgyad zhabs pa ni// dga' bar byed pa phrag dang ba gnyis kyis bdag ma dpapa 'byud pa/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thab/ ga rlab rgya byin byas/ 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): su gnas/ tsor yi dgas phyogs su gnas/ be chu bdag phyugs su gnas/ grwaswA ri gnod sbyin phyogs su gnas/ bdud bani 'dzams pa'i tshul du'o// gtsigs pa'i gzugs can skor gnas pa'o// brag sa 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i gzugs can/ dbang gyur du gnas/ sa ba rI me'i gdug nas/ tsan+da lI bden bral gyi gar gnas rlom bi rlung gi kyang gnas pa'o// ga tsa/ ga g+ha~M/ ya/ saM/ la/ DaM sa bon las su rdzogs nas dbyung bar bya/ 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): rI phyag g.yas na gri g.yon na nya/ tsi dwe g.yas na rnga'u chung g.yon na pag/ g+hA smA dI ga yas na sbrul/ g.yon na pad+ma'i snod/ drag ste g.yas seng ge g.yon dag sta/ sa b.rA ga yas na dge slong g.yon na gseg shang / tsats+tsha 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na 'khong la g.yon nazad pa/ tsam+bi ni g.yas rdo rjegayon sdig mdzub/ gi rI ba dag nag mai/ tsaM rI mdog dmar/ bat+tA le mdog sar/ g+ha lA rI mdog ldang / bug sI mdog sngo/ sa pa dI mdog dkar/ tsaN+Da lI na ma mtha'i 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): mdag/ tsam+b+hi ni kha dog sna tshogs thams cad spyan gsum pa/ sgra grol ba/ phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa thams cad bzhengs nas/ brdung ba sum du bzhugs pa/ thams cad kyang phyag gnyis pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): drag pa dang / gshin rnga dang / gnad sbyin dang / sngon po dang / sgyu ma yin rnams/ g+ho r-I la sogs pa rnams kyi gdan no// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dang bcas pa 'dod chags chen po zhus nas/ de nas lham ba zhes 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba/ sna tshogs glu yis mchod// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i thugs rje yis// bugs 'di bdag la skyobs// bde ba chen po skyong 'dod pas// stong pa'i rang bzhin pas la te bzhengs// stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal nas ni/ 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ba rI la dngos grub gsol// gal te gson par mchi bzhed na// dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhengs su gsol// tsaN+Da lI ni bdag gis su// mthong ba med nas gsol ba yis// ci'i phyir na stong par ba'agra 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon smon bzhin du dpa' bo rol// bdag ni Dom+bi'i mtshan ma med// khyod kyis sems ni shes pa ste// thugs rje med pa de mi rung // sku 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las ni sa bon 'byung // gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// bdag po dga'am sa ben gnyis// bar mi 'jigs pa sngon po gnyis// AHhUM gnyis kyi 'od zer las// rdo rje chen pa 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs pa'o// rtswa me gzugs su 'bros nas ni// rnam ma pa'i khams ni yongs gang ba'o// ting ga A khrel bsdus nas// rnal 'byor badz+ra n+ta ra zhes// ne sdang can pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur// zhabs pa nis la mnan pa 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): yis// mA dang lha min 'jigs par byed// ba dag nag pa 'jigs par byed// bdag med mal bde ba ster// rtag pa med pa'i ba brnyed// rig pa med pa'i rang bzhin gzugs// bdu pa ni sra pa nams kyi pa canan// 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed// mgo ba'i phreng brdzogs par b+ha// nyi ma'i gdan la gar thabs byed// sna tshags rnga rje spyi bor gnas// ba dog nag po 'jigs par byed// dang po nal ni nag pa che// g.yas kyai 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni ma m+b+har dkar// g.yon gyi zhas ni dmang po 'jigs// snying gi ldan po gcags pa'i nas// TI shwa rba pa'i spyan dang ldan// nib rnams gzhan ni nag pa'o// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing // thal bas lus kyang thugs 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// srin ma sgra langs sar ba yin// phyag rgya lnga yis skul brgyan// spyan ni ga stang sa tho bar ba// / sa ni bcu drug tsam gyi chad// grang ba nyi dang bang bu dang // ba lar rngam me dag dang // byal dang ni sang ga dang // ma 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag na thod pa brgyad// de rnams rim pa bzhin du gzhag/ sa yi lha dang chu yi lha// me yi lha dang rlung gi lha// zla ba'i lha dang nyi ma'i lha// gshin rje lha dang nor sbyin no// g.yon pa'i phyag na bcwa brgyad// de rnams rim 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dgang pa'o// zheg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang // nad dang gshed dpa zugs par byed pa dang // dza pa nas pa gas pa// babang ba ga dpa ldan// shAn ma shes mi gnyis pa// ni rgyu 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnam pa spangs// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko6/ mig gnyis la ni gti mug rdo rje'o// rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sA la ser sna rdo rje'o// khal 'dod 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): chags rdo rje'o// reg bya la phrag dog rdo rje'o// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o// sal spyod ma lus rdo rje ma// mkha' la spyod ma gsung rdo rje ma// snying gi dbus na gnas pa ni bdag med ma'o// rang gi snying ga'i sa bon 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): las/ 'od nag pa lugs kyu 'dra ba 'phros pas// khams gsum gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ mchod pa lha mo brgyad dag gis bya'o// de nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// i a b+hi Shi uT+Ta mA sa rba badz+ra ta thA ga ga/ rdzogs 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): nas thams cad he ru ka/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chu// bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur ba'o// de nas me tog gi char dang / ras dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum char du 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): phab pa yis/ nam mkha'i khams sna tshogs pa'i sgra yis gang nas/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis mchod pa byas nas/ lo tsan la sogs pa yis// rdo rje'i glus kyang bstod par byed/ de ltar dbang bskur zin nas/ mi 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa 'khar lo'i gzugs can/ rna ba snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid/ mgul du rin chen 'byung ldan/ ska rags don yod grub pa/ gdu bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du dran par bya'o// phyag rgya lnga rnam par 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): / dag pa rigs lnga'o// snying rje rnam par dag pas spyan dmar po// byams pa rnam par dag pa mdog nag po// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa pags pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): rus pa/ phyag rgya rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas lnga'o// gdug pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i gzugs so// sha rnam par dag pa puk+ka sI'o// khrag rnam par dag pas ba rI'o// byang chub rnam par dag pa tsaN+Da 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): da rnal pa dag // rnam pa ba brjid rnam pa dgu pa nas brgyad sus ngag yid gas sa rnam pa dag pa spya rgyu/ rnam par dag pa phyag bcun// 'drad pa'i rnam par dag pa 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / gau r-I la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'o// sa rnam par dag pas puka sI'o// chu rnam par dag pas ba rI'o/ 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): me rnam par dag pa tsaN+Da lI'o// rlung rnam par dag bzom+bi ru gsungs so// dus gsum du gnas pa las langs nas khwa'i gzugs su bya'o// nyon mongs pa med na sngags kyis bzlas pa byas te/ oM de ba bi tsu badz+ra hU hUM hUM pha 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ bya ba thams cad he ru ka'i gzugs su bya ste/ dngos grub gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ he ru ka'i gzugs su bya'o// zla ba drug tu 'dug na dngos grub 'byung ste/ 'khrul pa'i bsam pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur ro// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// brjod pa thams cad sngags yin te// he ru ka ni gnas pa ni// rnam shes yang dag shes pa yin// rgyud las sgrub thabs bsdus pa'o// shes dang mi shes 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): mi dpogs pas// zab mo tshul ni gsal byed pa// shes rab 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las// skad cig man ngag srubs shing gis// slob dpon bde ba'i man ngag gis// bsdus pas bdud rtsi za ba ltar// de yis blo yis 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): shes pa yin// he ru ka yi sgrub thabs 'di// legs par gsal bar byas pa ni// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las brtsams// de bzhin gsungs pa'i rim pa yis// bdag gis bsod nams 'di dang ni// dpal gyi sngag 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rim brjod pas/ yin pa'i byang chub man dge bas// myur bar sems can grol gyur cig/ bla ma dang ni pha ma dang // 'khor mi rnams kyi thos dga' ba// byang chub snying por byas pa 'di// sngon du dran pa'i ye shes 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// de nyid brjod pa byas pa 'dis// dpal gyi yid ni rnyed par shog/ he badz+ra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kar tsan+d+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba lha btsan po

38b6(rgyud 'grel): pa// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod// de yi rim pa ma nor bar// mdor bsdus rim pa bshad par bya// zhal bsre tshig bya ba la// rgyas pa'i las ni mchog yin te// rgyas nas brtsams te las rnams kyi// rim pa rab

38b8(rgyud 'grel): gang dang ni khru do nyid// rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod// khru gang dang ni de yi byed// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod// gzhul bzhi bcu nyi shu kha// zabs su sor bcu dbang gi yin// ngos gsum sor ni nyi shu la/

39a7(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba bzhag par bya// yon chab snod ni gser la sogs// chu dang me tog gis bkang bzhag/ med nas las byas pa'ang rung // shing ni mi shes spang bar bya// dgang gzar blugs gzar mar mdun du// g.yas/
