578b1(rgyud 'grel): gagasal ba dang // las kyi rdo rjes sngang bzhin du// rakas bsrung ba nas gzung nas// mchod stod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar// bdag nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs// bla mas kyang ni sngang bzhin du// mos pas 'pho dang ting 'dzin ni// gzugs brnyan la brten sa bon 
578b2(rgyud 'grel): nam// phyag mtshan tsam gyis lha rnams bskyed// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum bsres la// rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od zer phyung ste lha rnams bsdu// de la mchod dgug gzhug la sogs// sngar bzhin thim pas ye shes 'bar// mu dang 'o ma 'dres pa 
578b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// bsrubs te gzhan du yang ma yin// de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi bsres la// bla mas mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi myang dang bzlas brjod bya// de tshe bla mas bzlas dang bsgom// rnal 'byor ldan la slob ma 
578b4(rgyud 'grel): ye// maN+Dal sngon 'gro gsol ba ga ba// de yi ngor byas bla ma nyid// ji ltar slob mas 'jug pa bzhin// rim gyis byas te dbang yang yin// chu dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa// rjes gnang mthar thug rim bzhin no// lha yis rjes gnang byin pa yang // khyod 
578b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis sems can bsdu ba dang // phan 'dogs dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang // dbang bsrung dam tshig ldan par gyis// ni sogs las kyi rjes gzung dang // tshar gcod pa yi sems can kun// don rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ dman dang mchog gi dngos 
578b6(rgyud 'grel): grub la// skal ba bzhin du rim par sbyor// de nas sngon du brtags pa yi// slob ma mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// 'jug dang dbang thob bya phyir brjod// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pos// de sogs sngang bzhin brjod pa dang // bla mas brtse dang ldan pa khyod// su yin ci 
578b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod gang la dga'// zhes pa brjod nas slob ma yis// skal ldan bdag lags rnam grol 'tshal// bde ba che la bdag dga'o// zhes brjod yang ni 'di skad brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi// 
578b8(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par gsol// zhes pas slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// he ru ka 
579a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag bya ste// oM na maHte hUM/ oM na maHmi hUM/ oM na mo na maHhUM zhes bya ba dang / oM sarba ta thA 
579a2(rgyud 'grel): ga ta k+Sha ya bA kri d+ha pa Na men badz+ra ba nad ni ka ro mi zhes pas kyang // gogasum gus pas phyag byas la// de nas sngang bzhin slob ma yis// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// thub pa nyi ma la sogs brjod// de bzhin sdom pa dam tshig ni// sta gon gnas pa sngar bzhin 
579a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod// deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang du zhugs kyis// nges khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub 
579a4(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag gzhug pa ni// 
579a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te tshul 'di spras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// de nas ka pA la'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas dam tshig gi chu klud pa ni kye'i rdo rje'i gzi mdangs dang ldan pas 'di skad brjod do// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed// 
579a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis grub// oM sarba badz+ra pany+tsa a mr-i ta u da ka hUM/ de nas brtsams nas khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi gang ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos te/ da khyod nga la brnyas pa'i las ma byed 
579a7(rgyud 'grel): cig/ byas na khyod kyi mi bde ba ma spangs pas/ tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas 'di skad brjod do// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes
579a8(rgyud 'grel): pas yol ba'i nang du drangs te/ ye shes dbab pa bla ma'i man ngag bzhin bya'o// de nas mthong ba dri dang me tog gi phreng ba thogs te pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes brjod cing phreng ba dor ba dang / mig dbye bar bya ste/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis// mig 'byed pa ni brtson pa ste/ 
579b1(rgyud 'grel): mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad pas// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// he badz+ra pa bya de nyid sngags su brjod pa ni oM badz+ra satwa swa yan+te ya/ tsa gat+ta ya ung+ga ta ya ta khro/ badz+ra tsak+Shu dA nuSh+Ta te/ he badz+ra pra be sha/ de nas gdong g.yogs phud cing 'di skad brjod do// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ 
579b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rig skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs kun dang // dngos grub thams cad mngon du gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang brtson par 
579b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis zhes brjod pa dang / me tog gang la ltung ba'i lha ngo bstan cing lhag pa'i lha dbog/ sngags bslab cing de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o// de la gzhal yas khang gru bzhir byung ba ni// tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o// sgo bzhi ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi// 
579b4(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// rta babs bzhin yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// dra ba ni nyon mongs pa chen po rnam par dag pa'o// dra ba phyed pa ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu rnam par dag pa'o// ka ba brgyad ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
579b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rnam par dag pa'o// dar gyi pa ti la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams ni gzugs dang sba la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o// rdo rje ra ba ni zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags so// 
579b6(rgyud 'grel): me 'od ni phyi rol gyi bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs pa'i rtags so// bum pa brgyad ni che ba'i yon tan gyis rgyas shing thugs rje chen po'i ros yongs su gang ba'i rtags so// de nas lha'i de kho na nyid bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni 
579b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// gau dI ni zhe sdang dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// chom rkun ma ni gti mug dang sgra rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// ro langs ma ning rgyal dang dri rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// 
579b8(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sA rI ni 'dod chags dang ro rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// puk+ka si ni zhe sdang dang sa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// ri khrod ma ni gti mug dang chu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// gtum mo ni nga rgyal dang me rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// g.yung mo ni 
580a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dang rlung rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni yab dang mthun no// de ltar de kho na nyid bshad nas slob mas maN+Dal sngon du 'go bas bla ma'i zhabs la gtug cing yon gyi mchog phul nas dbang bskur ba'i/ 
580a2(rgyud 'grel): don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de yang thun mong gi dbang nod pa yin na/ 'di skad brjod do// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol// 'khor ba 'dam gyi 
580a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dag tu// bying ba skyapas med bdag la skyabs// mgon po khyod kyis bka' drin gyis// rig pa'i dbang bskur bdag la gsol// zhes pa dang / khyad par slob dpon gyi dbang yin na 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ he ru ka dpal dbang bkur ba// 'gro ba brgyab phyir/ 
580a4(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid can// ci ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin bdag la de gsol cig/ dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid// ces pa'o// de nas 
580a5(rgyud 'grel): thun mong dang khyad par gyi slob ma rnams tha mal gyi stan dang / khyad par gyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'am/ pad+mas mtshan pa bzhag par bya'o// gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can phub nas/ slob dpon gyis yang lha rnams ci rigs par mchod nas/ bdud 
580a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang dri'i chu dang zhungs kang du thogs nas bdag nyidang rgyal dang bcas pas 'di skad brjod// nyon cig par chad bgegs kyi tshogs/ ngani dpal ldan rdorje 'chang // mtshon cha sna tshags 'bar ba'i bdag/ gdug pa ma lus 'joms par byed// 
580a7(rgyud 'grel): denges shig par chad bgegs kyi tshogs// nga yis bka' las 'da' ma byed// tsaM ste bka' las 'das gyur na// rdul phran bzhin du dag par byed ces dang / bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bsrad pa'am/ 2 
580a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing rab dang gur la sogs pas bsrung ba'o// de nas slob mas khrus byas shing // stod g.yogs la sogs gos bzangs ldan// drug pa rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang // nod phyir snyim pa me tog gis// dkyil 'khor 
580b1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gtso la dbul// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes pa'i sngags kyis brjod pas so// de rjes bla mas me tog blangs// slob ma'i mgo la bcing byas la// oM d+harmA kur+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod pas ni// chos kun bsdus shing 'khyil pas ni// lhag pa'i lha 
580b2(rgyud 'grel): yin pas de skad du// phreng ba yid dam rgyal ba'i dbang // sgom phyir dbang bskur dam tshig ldan// de rjes las kyi rdo rje yis// bum pa'i chu rnams bsdus nas ni// bzang po rnams la bum par bsdu// de rjes dung chos nyid du'o// de nas rnam rgyal chu 
580b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyis// dril bu'i sgra dang dbyangs bcas pas// dbang bkur ba ni 'di skad brjod// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi// khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi chu yi dbang // deng 'dir khyod la sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas 
580b4(rgyud 'grel): kun ni rab sgrub phyir// chu dbang dam pa khyed kyis long // oM sarba ta thA ga ta u da ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// des ni rnam par rtog pa dang // nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar byed// de nas gser la sogs pa'i rin po che dang shing dang ba 
580b5(rgyud 'grel): so la sogs pa'i 'bur mar brkos pa 'am/ thang ka'i ri mo 'am dbu rgyan du byas te/ traM las rin chen 'byung ldan du bsam zhing dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' bstim la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang sngags 
580b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa byas la 'di skad brjod do// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi// khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan dbang // thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen 
580b7(rgyud 'grel): dag gis dbu rgyan dang // dar dpyangs dbang ba ur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra pa rA ha ka badz+ra a ri li hoHde nas yang rdo rje a las snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la 'di skad brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// he ru ka dpal rgyal po dang / 
580b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dbang mchog ni// de ring khyod la dbang bsrung ngo // oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi ba tiSh+Tha a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tiSh+Tha bi nga sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas de nyid brjod pa ni// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po/ 
581a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ zhes pa ste/ rdo rje'i dbang bsrur ba'i lag pa g.yas par sbyin no// de nas dril bu khaM las don yod grub par bskyed la 'di skad brjod do// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// shes rab 
581a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed// de yi de nyid bshad pa ni// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi bdag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas// de bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// srid pa'i dam pa byed par/ 
581a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// badz+ra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// zhes pas lag pa g.yon par dung byin la// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bar bya ste// buM las rnam par snang mdzad du bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang zhes pa la sogs pa brjod la/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka d+hi/ 
581a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ti k+Sh+Na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi shrI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka ta zhes brjod cing rdo rje dril bu mgo'i thad kar sbyin no// de nas brtul zhugs kyis brtan par bya'o// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcing // haMru/ 
581a5(rgyud 'grel): ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan// rdo rje'i rtse mo nas slob ma 'dzin du bcug la sngags 'di brjod do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+ha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e Sha traM d+ha ra ya mi hUM swA hA ha ha hi hi zhes brjod la lag par rdo rje rgya gram sbyin no// de nas he ru ka dpal gzun// 
581a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin// rdo rje slob dpon go 'phang thob// he ru ka dpal kha T+wAM ga/ rnal 'byor ma ni Ta ma ru// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing // tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag/ gri gug dang ni ka pA la// dpa' 
581a7(rgyud 'grel): bopo chen pos blang bar gyis zhes brjod la// slob ma de g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pas gnas la/ rdo rje gri gug g.yas su sbyin zhing // dril bu dang / mdu nga ka pA la g.yon du sbyin zhing // kha T+wAM ga g.yas su brten pa sbyin par bya ste/ de lta bu'i che ba'i bdag 
581a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid dag dang ldan par brjod do// 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang rjes su gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang ldan zhing phrin las kyang rdzogs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / rengs pa dang / bskrad pa dang

581b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dri ma dag cing mthong lam gyi nus pa 'jog/ dbang bsrung ba bzhi pas ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag sgom pa'i lam dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i nus pa 'jog/ dbang bsrung ba de dag gis dbang bsrur ba'i rim pa ni tha

581b6(rgyud 'grel): gang gi tshe rab tu gnas par byed par 'dod na/ de'i don kyang 'di yin te/ sdom ni shes par bya dang nyams su blang // 'bras bu dang ni rnam pa gsum// de la shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ rab tu gnas pa thun mong dang / khyad par ru shes par bya'o// mnga' 
581b7(rgyud 'grel): dbul lha ltar mchod pa dang / slob ma lta bur dbang bskur ba// spyan dbye thun mong gser zur gyis// tshigs bcad sngags dang bcas par brjod// khyad par spyan ni dbye ba'o// zhal bsro ba ni sbyin sreg gis// slob ma shis par bya phyir dang // lha rnams 
581b8(rgyud 'grel): tshim pa'i don du'o// de'i rjes la nyams su blang ba ni 'di yin te// sngar bzhin tha mar 'os pa la// slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pas gsol ba gdab pa dang / bsnyen pa dang / sa cho ga dang sngar bzhin byas la/ dkyil 'khor me long gi ngos ltar mnyam/ 
582a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng du'am/ stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du'o// sta gon yo cad thams cad nye bar sogs la/ de la slob dpon du 'os pa ni 'di yin te/ brtan zhing dul pa blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ 
582a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// de nyid bcu ni legs par shas// 'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya// de yi bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces pa ni/ des kyang cho ga chad pa med par phun sum tshogs par bya// 
582a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di skad du/ cho ga nyams par mi bya ste// rab gnas rtag tu smad pa dang // tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal chen po dang // 'jig rten gzhan du 'jigs chen 'byung // de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus las// de bzhin cho gar

582a7(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bskor zhing gtor bar bya// sbyang zhing bsrung ba dag tu bya// oM he badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha na sarba pA pa da ha na he badz+ra ya hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas 'bru mar la dur ba'i pir gyis byug cing // oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya be sho d+ha ni sA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT/ 
582a8(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ de nas shun pags lnga yis dril phyis dang / khrus la sogs pa byas kyang rung // ma byas kyang sngar gyi de dag gis rten sbyang ba'o// bdug spos thogs shing rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas sangs rgyas thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la 
582b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha'i rnam par bsdus la 'di skad brjod do// dgyes mdzad rdo rje bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// slob ma la yang brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas// mgon po
582b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la// de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs// bdag gi ming brjod 'di zhes pas// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes bya// yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni// nang bar rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// bdag dang slob 
582b3(rgyud 'grel): mar bcas pa la// thugs brtse bar ni nyer dgongs nas// tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas la// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// zhes pa dang / yang na phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang 
582b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab cing snyim pa'i me tog gtor zhing 'di skad do// nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// me tog bzang por rin chen char// sku la rab tu 'bab 'gyur bas// kye kye so sor bzhes su gsol// oM pa ram 
582b5(rgyud 'grel): su Sha sha ya su la li ta bi la sa mi te/ na ma mi b+ha ga bAny+dzaHhUM baM hoHhi hi hi hi/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ku su ma any+dza li nA tha ho// ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin 
582b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dir khyod bzhugs mdzod// 'dir zhugs rtag tu mgon po ni// gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di// byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir// bdag cag don du bzhes su gsol zhes brjod de// de yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing 
582b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang nod pa yin na// sngar bzhin du lha sta gon du gnas pa nyid bya// ma yin na mgon po bsdu ba dag tsam gyis bya'o// de bzhin du dbang yin na slob ma lhag gnas la sngar bzhin du bya ba yin la/ ma yin na 'di tsam gyis slob ma lhag 
582b8(rgyud 'grel): par gnas par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gis gson pa'ang / 'bras bur bcas// lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru// 'byung bar bdag nyid the tshom med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig las// mi ldog par ni/ 
583a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni// deng bdag skye bar the tsom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog/ 
583a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// zhes brjod do// de nas gal te rdul tshon ma bris pa'i lhag gnas yin na shin tu snga bar thig dang tshon la sogs pa sngang bzhin du byas la/ nyi ma bzang po la rab gnas 'di ltar bya ste/ yang slob dpon grogs dang bcas pas cho ga nyams par/ 
583a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bya ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pas yo byad thams cad bsog cing bstar ba dang / rgyan thams cad bre ba dang / yang rang nyid grogs dang bcas pas khrus dang byug pa nas gzung ste/ bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bdag nyid la ldan pa
583a4(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa sngar bzhin du bya zhing // klu gzugs la sogs bya dor bya ba nas/ shun pags lnga ste/ dzam+bu ka dang / ka ta dang / bil+la dang / a mra dang / bi tsu pu ri las byung ba'i dril phyis bya ba dang / de bzhin du sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / 
583a5(rgyud 'grel): de ring rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// zhes pa bcug la/ deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// zhes pa'i bar du'o zhes brjod do// de nas pa yungs rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa'i tshul// oM bi shud+d+he/ badz+ra gro d+ha hUM oM pru dz+ri Na hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes 
583a6(rgyud 'grel): pas mngon par bzlas pa'i chus khrus bya zhing / rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas 'di brjod par bya'o// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba// lha yi gru ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// 
583a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye swA hA/ gzhan yang spyan la sogs pa'i sngags/ oM ru ru s+phu ru la sogs pa'i yang brjod cing / bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa gang yang rung ba gcig gis dbyangs su brjod do// de nas ras kyis klu 
583a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ bde gshegs su gzugs dpe dang bral gyis kyang // 'gro ba'i don du klu gzugs cir yang gda'// rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i gyon bral zhing // 'jig rten bsnyen bkur ri mo'i tshul du ni// dri med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab sngags/ 
583b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku byis pas// nyon mongs grib pa ma lus kun byang nas// su gsum dang du bdag cag grub par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra wa sta ye swA hA/ oM tsi tra gan+d+he swA hA/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni swA hA/ de rab tu gnas pa'i 
583b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos bzhi nyid yin te/ de yang sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus dang // rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// zhes pa dang / sku gzugs nying kang rab tu gzhug/ ces pa dang / bsdu ba'i tshig 'dis shes par bya ste/ ting 'dzin ye shes 
583b3(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs dang // dbang bskur ba yi rab gnas bzang // de la dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni// sku gzugs sa bon phyag mtshan nam// skad cig sogs kyi lha yi sku// dkyil 'khor lha rnams lugs bzhin pa kyad// zhing ka'i sabon 
583b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// nam mkha' bsdus la mchod cing bstim// de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni// skye mched drug dang klu gsung thugs// byin gyis brlab pa sngang bzhin bya// de nas dbang bsrung ba ni// chu dang dbu rgyan nas gzung ste// rjes su/ 
583b5(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba'i bar du sbyin// gzhan yang rin chen bdun la sogs// ci rigs par yang dbang bskur bya mnga' dbul ba yang dbang der gtogs// de nas spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bya ste/ gser gyi zung ma la sogs pa mang dang sbrang rtsi la bsres te// 
583b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan dbye zhing 'di ces brjod do// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal ba yis// 'jig rten ling rtog pasal ba ltar// khyod kyis kyang ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal zhes pa dang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsaka tsak+Sha sa man+ta tsak+Shu tsak+Shu 
583b7(rgyud 'grel): bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ khyad par du spyan dbye ba ni slob ma la ye shes 'bebs pa ltar 'dir bya'o// de nas mnga' 'bul bar bya ste/ dang por gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dbul bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rnam par 
583b8(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i gzugs brnyan la gdugs phul bas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ga sung thugs rnam par dag pa ni zhal gro zhing byin che 'gro ba skyob pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yon gyi bdag po la sogs pa khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad 
584a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gdung ba sel cing 'gro ba skyob pa'i skal ba dang ldan par grur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan// bul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul 
584a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tshat+taM shrI sa ma ye hUM zhes gsum ma ma bdun gyi bar du brjod do// de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bsgre zhing sbyang bar bya'o// rgyal mtshan yang sngar bzhin mdzad nas ji ltar sngon gyi 
584a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la// bar chod bdud las rgyal ba'i rtags// phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+h+wa dza ke tu shrI sa ma ye hUM/ de nas 'ban dang ba dan dbul te/ ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la/ 
584a4(rgyud 'grel): snyam pa'i ba dan phyogs bcur grogs// phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa ta ka shrI sa ma ye hUM/ de bzhin bla re la sogs pa la yang ngo // yang khrus byas te mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul lo// 
584a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhal zas 'bul lo// de nas mchod pa'i tshig sngar bzhin sbyang la/ sems can thams cad bkres skom dang / mu ge la sogs pa'i bskal pa las thar bar gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A ha bru~M dza shrI sa ma ye hUM/ de nas na bza' dbul/ 
584a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ sems can thams cad gos dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/ lha'i na bza' ba ku li ga reg na bde ba gyon pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta na nA wa sA na nA wastA shrI sa ma ye hUM/ de nas zhal ba so bya ste/ 
584a7(rgyud 'grel): de yang sbyin sreg gis bya'o// slob ma shes par bya phyir dang // lha rnams tshim pa'i don tay-i// de yang sdang bzhin chog ltang // de nas kyang par du yang nang gi gru gzugs la tshogs kyi mchod pa dang na phy-i ston mo yang bya'o// de'i rjes la mchod gnas 
584a8(rgyud 'grel): su gtad pa ni/ khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa// su gzugs dag ni khyad par du// ci kad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa// de ni ngas byas byed du bcug/ khyed kyis de ni kun rdzogs par// ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis// de nas srung ma bgro// 
584b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// nag po chen po dgug pa dang // gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya// de la mchod dang gtor ma sbyin// de la bka' lung bsgo bya ba// nga yis rab gnas byas pa yis// gtsug lag khang la sogs 
584b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di// ji srid gnas pa de srid du// bsrung zhing khyod kyis legs par skyongs// dkon mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi// bka' gsal khyod kyis bsrung ba dang // ston pa'i bka' dang slob dpon gyi// bka' lung bsgo ba legs par 
584b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs// de nas bzod gsol bya ste/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang // de sras tshang sogs lha tshegs kun// gang zhig cho ga byas pa ni// nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs// de nas gshegs gsol byed 'dod na// 'di tsam 
584b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya ba ste// sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang // bde legs chen po kun mdzad par// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la gshegs// de nas byin rlabs brtan pa brjod// gang 'di sku gzugs bskal
584b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'am// bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing // sa dang me dang chu dang ni// rlung las lha rnams kun gyis srung // slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang // bu dang tsha bo rnams 'phel te// rab dka' yid bde gyur nas ni// rab gnas bzang por 
584b6(rgyud 'grel): dag tu bzhugs// rab gnas spyi yi shes byas na// gal te glegs bam ras ris sogs// yin na gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin// yig 'brur sgyur dang khrus la sogs// sngags la sogs pa ci rigs bya// gzhung mangs dogs nas
584b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma brjod// de rjes gzhung rdzogs tshigs bcad brjod// gang gis 'di rtsom pa yang bdag ming ni// mi mthun phyogs kyis thub bka' mi bskyod pa// mtha' na rdo rje ldan pas btsas pa'i ming // ma btsas grags pa bsod nams 
584b8(rgyud 'grel): kun la khyab// mtha' na rgyal mtshan ldan pas snyam pa'i gsung // gang brtsams gzhung de rab tu grub pa yang // sgrub pa po yi lag tu bya ba yang // mtha' ru blang ba ldan pas don kun rdzogs// tshigs bcad rkyang ba rnams spras rim 
585a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la// mtha' na zhes bya ldan pas grags chen po// gang ltar don de rab tu rdzogs pa yang // mngon rtogs sgrub thabs dbang dang rab gnas yin// sgrub thabs dang mthun bla ma'i mngon rtogs la// mtha' ru sgrub pa dang ldan
585a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs// dri ma dag cing nus 'jog dbang la yang // mtha' ru rab gnas ldan pas gzhan don rdzogs// gang phyir sbyin pa'i 'bras bus 'grub pa yang // phrin las dngos grub rang gzhan don du yin// de las nung
585a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig go zlog 'di shes bya// bsnyen pa mngon rtogs rim pa rang don las// mtha' nas gzhan don ldan pas sgrub pa'i don// dbang bskur ba las 'byung ba'i dngos grub la// 'phrin las ldan pas rab gnas bzang po yin// bod kyi 
585a4(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis// gzhung dag las ni gsungs pa yin mod kyang // bla mas rang la rang gis gzhan la ste// mdzad pa'i rim pa bsdus shing legs par bsgyur ba rdzogs so// / 50gadzo cho gas zugs 
585a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ba liM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nung gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs rnams 'tshe bzhi bya dang // las rnams thams cad bslub pa'i phyir// 'byung po thams cad
585a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dag/ sbyin pa'i cho ga yang dag bri// de la dang po rnal 'byor pa stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di lan gsum du yongs su bzlas te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 
585a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dag pa la lhag par bya'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod de/ khams gsum po thog ma nas ma skyes shing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par mi rtog pa/ gnyis med pa'i de bzhin 
585a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam du dmigs la/ nam mkha'i khams rgya chen po'i dbus su/ chos 'byung gi phyag gyen du gnas pa rnam par bsgom zhing / de'i 'og tu de'i dbus na sna tshogs pad+ma rgya chen po dang / zla ba la sogs pa'i 
585b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi yi dam gyi lha'i rnal 'byor bskyed par bya'o// de'i 'og tu snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba ma lus pa snang bar byas pa sngon du can gyi sa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
585b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag po gzugs na spyod pa tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang nye dbang la sogs 'jig rten myong ba thams cad dang / mi dang mi 
585b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa thams cad dang / thags bzang nges dang sa'i lha la sogs pa dang / klu la sogs pa sems can yang dag par drangs te/ chos 'byung gi dbus su rnam par bsam mo// 
585b4(rgyud 'grel): del dang por steng gi phyogs kyi gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa'i lha/ ral bcod pan dag dang dkar/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / 'od zer dkar po phreng bar ldan/ 
585b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug sogs// lha rnams rin chen cod pan 'chang // sna tshogs rgyan dang 'od ldan pa'o// steng gi nyi tha 
585b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs de bzhin// rang rang phyogs kyis phyogs gdab po// rang rang mdog dang phyag mtshan sogs// ldan pa go rims bzhin du bsgom// thags bzangs ris dang 
585b7(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs// klu yi bdag po brgyad rnams kyang // rang gi ye shes sems snying ga'i// sa bon las byung rigs gsum gyis// ye shes rnam par snang mdzad sogs// 
585b8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su rim gyis bsgrub par bya// de la da ni sems can thams cad yongs su sbyor bar byed pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste/ rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las zla ba 
586a1(rgyud 'grel): bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'i yi ge oM mdog dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ 'od kun nas 'bro ba mgo bo'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer gyis 
586a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par bsgrub par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon de nyid las rnal 'byor pa'i yi ge hUM nor bu 
586a3(rgyud 'grel): mthon ka'i mdog can la nor bu mthon ka'i 'od 'phro ba/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// de la 'od 'phros rnam bsams te// 'od zer sprin des bkug nas ni// 'dod na 
586a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten spong basbyang byas te// sangs rgyas mi bstod gzugs dag tu// thub par yongs su bsgom par bya// de ma thag tu rang gi ye shes sems 
586a5(rgyud 'grel): dpe'i thugs ka de nyid las yi ge a dmar po 'od zer dbang ba'i tsho gas rab tu 'phro ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ kun nas spros pa de'i 'od zer dmar po spros pas thags zangs ris dang / sa'i lha dang

586a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgrubs pa de la gzugs na spyod pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang mdzad kyis rigs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i

586b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgrubs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ mgo bo la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar byas la/ de dag gi lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas 
586b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi mdun du bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i dngos po ci 'byor pa btsal la/ dang po nga yaM yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu/ rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du/ 
586b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum rab tu 'bar ba'i gzugs can dang / de'i steng du yi ge aHyongs su gyur pa'i ka pA la yongs su bsgoms la/ ka pA la de'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga/ buM aM dzi khaM hUM zhes de 
586b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon byin gyis brlabs pa bsams la/ de'i 'og tu spang ba dang dros pa la sogs pa'i cho gas yang dag par bsgrubs la/ yi ge oM gyis byid gyis brlabs par blta'o// de'i steng du yi ge hUM las grub/ 
586b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje bsams la/ de nas yi ge oM gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ bdud rtsi lnga po de'i steng du rab tu bstims la/ de ma thag tu 'bar ba dang / dros pa dang / yi ge oM 
586b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur par bsams la/ aN+Da la sogs pa dbul zhing / de ltar bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsho gas thams cad kyi ljags rdo rje las 'bros pa'i 'od zer gyi sbu gus rab tu drangs pas tshim par 
586b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas rdo rje dang dril bu yang dag par blangs te/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags kyis/ dngos po de dag lan bdun gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas de rnams la dbul te/ rdo rje mur du gsor byas nas// 
586b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sbyor bas kun brtags kyis// ri bo thams cad nges bsal bya// de nas dril bu gsil byas la// rgyal bas stong nyid rtogs 'gyur ba'i// mchog tu dgyes pa'i sgra yis ni// tshigs bcad 'di ni lan gsum brjod// 
587a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni sgrub par byed// de la gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM A 
587a2(rgyud 'grel): tA rau mu She sarba d+harmANAM/ A d+ha nut+pan+natwA ta/ oM AHhUM phaT sAH/ de kho na nyid kyi sngags 'di lan gsum 'am bdun brjod do// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dag ni// rjes dran gtor ma byin gyis brlab// ji ltar bdud 
587a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsero dag gis// de ltar thams cad tshim par bya// yang dag 'thor 'thung byin nas ni// bzod bya gshegs su gsol bar bya// de la gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM khyed kyis sems can 
587a4(rgyud 'grel): don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol// oM AHhUM muHskyeb med dang 'gag pa med/ 
587a5(rgyud 'grel): thog ma nas ni rang bzhin dag/ 'gro kur 'di dag mthong nas ni// gshegs chen 'di ni bya ba yin// gtor sbyin chog legs bris nas// bdag gis bsod nams gang nyer bsags/ 
587a6(rgyud 'grel): des ni 'gro ba 'di dag kun// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sdod 'gyur shog/ d+hi g+ha lar skyes dge slong ni// mang ma mdzad dpal ye shes kyis// bla ma ma nyes las thob gyur 
587a7(rgyud 'grel): ma 'di nyid rab tu bshad/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
